title: "China's Didi will begin using AI to run virus monitoring in Latin America"
excerpt: "China ride-hailing giant Didi Chuxing said on Wednesday that it will start using artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to verify if drivers in its Latin American markets wear masks and disinfect cars to keep rides safe amid the coronavirus pandemic."
